participant_1.background:
I like to make my own art, so I would like to decorate my baby's nursery with handmade wall art.
going to the beach is my favorite past time.
I like taking my dog to the dog park to meet other dogs and play.
i m a really , really good guitar player.
pizza is my most favorite thing.

participant_2.background:
My family is supportive of my musical dreams, and we often go to the opera together.
I love to go to concerts with my friends because we can all sing and dance along.
I am a hard worker, and I don't let my height get in the way of my work.
My future clients will love how I've combined my love of cleanliness and my talent for planning to create the best wedding days of their lives.
I like to make things with my hands.

content.text: I'm doing well! Thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm good! I'm just hanging out at home, trying to figure out what I want to do today.
That sounds nice! I'm working on a project for school right now, but I'm taking a break to chat.
What kind of project are you working on?
I'm planning a wedding for a friend of mine. I'm also a wedding planner, so I'm excited to be able to do something that I love for someone I care about.
That's so cool! I'm sure your friend will be really happy with the way your wedding turns out.
Thanks! I hope so! I'm working hard to make it perfect.
I'm sure it will be! So, what's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to go to concerts and sing along with my friends. I also love to go to the beach and play with my dog.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun! I love to go to the beach too. It's my favorite place to relax and recharge.
I know, right? The beach is the best!
So, what are you looking forward to the most in the future?
I'm looking forward to graduating from college and starting my career as a wedding planner. I'm also looking forward to getting married and starting a family.
Those are both great things to look forward to! I'm sure you'll do great things in the future
